name: HemPoland sp. z o.o.
goal: HemPoland is the first private company in Poland to obtain a state license allowing it to grow and manufacture Cannabis Sativa. “Go big or go home” – hence, since the very beginning we aim to develop dynamically and introduce innovative solutions on the global scale. Our twenty person-strong team consists of experts in various fields, their international experience, passion and commitment guarantee the top quality of the production process. Thanks to this meticulous production control our flagship product – CannabiGold oil gained well-deserved internatonal recognition in many European countries (e.g., in Netherlands and Switzerland).
euInitiatives: Food safety regulations regarding industrial hemp products,  European Commission initiatives to regulate the limits for THC content in food products at safe levels, strategy towards large scale hemp cultivation, regulations regarding hemp cultivars allowed for propagation
